findings.title: Decimals Assumption in Rewards Calculations
findings.description: Rewards calculations assumes 18 decimals for tokens. Tokens with a different number of decimals may cause issues.

findings.title: Unused Functions in SafeERC20 Contract
findings.description: safeApprove, safeIncreaseAllowance and safeDecreaseAllowance of the SafeERC20 contract is never used.
